title: ContextThread
description: Represents a conversation thread containing messages.

id.description: Unique identifier for the context thread (UUID v4).

title.description: Optional user-defined title for the thread.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the thread was created (Unix epoch ms).

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the thread was last updated (Unix epoch ms).

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the thread.

messages.description: An array of Message objects belonging to this thread.
